name: Prison Break (DrAw3some)
description:
Quick game I threw together for mini jam 87 as an excuse to learn the Godot engine. There is less content than I would have liked but i'm just happy it doesn't crash anymore (I hope). Ran out of time to add music but I hope you'll find it at least a little fun.

Controls

Arrow keys - Move

Spacebar - Interact with Buttons/Switches

Shift - Place meat
